ProjectTitle: Single-molecule Protein Dynamics using Correlative Nanopore and Fluorescence Measurements
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/05/2023
Data: Please also list the samples and/or materials that you use, these are physical data, if you are using samples/cells from humans origin also make sure you have ethical approval, for more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/index
Metadata: which metadata standards will you use? For more  information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: storing data on hard drives is not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide for a more secure solution: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: you can also consider using the KU Leuven repository RDR as alternative for Zenodo (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
